channel.title: PlayerHasItem ? help

item.title: PlayerHasItem ? help
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:8, topic:317976”]it would still work if the player has 6k.

if(playerHasItem(995, 5000)) { deleteItem(995, 5000); sM("worked."); } else { sM("get more cash poor noob!"); }[/quote]
That should work… I tryed it with my lotto it was 5k and I had 1000m…
It worked and deleted the 5k…
here

Read full topic

item.title: PlayerHasItem ? help
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

if(HasItemAmount(995, 5000)
{
sM("worked?");
}
else
{
sM("You need more cash")
}

That will work for you I think, not 100% positive though.

Read full topic

it would still work if the player has 6k.

item.title: PlayerHasItem ? help
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

if(playerHasItem(995, 5000)) { deleteItem(995, 5000); sM("worked."); }

if player has 5k cash, deletes it and sends the message worked.

Read full topic

item.title: PlayerHasItem ? help
item.dc:creator: @nadnerb_doow nadnerb_doow
item.description:
@nadnerb_doow wrote:

if(playerHasItem(955, 5000))
{
sM("worked?");
}
else
{
sM("You need more cash")
}

The playerHasItem method usually checks to see if they have at least that amount, so the code I wrote basically says if they have at least 5000 gp, display “worked?”, otherwise display “You need more cash”.

Read full topic

item.title: PlayerHasItem ? help
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

I’m wokring with my make-over mage and i wanna make it cost 5,000 Coints to get a make over and i tryed this, but. here my error how do i make it so if you have more then 5000 coints you can still change.

if(playerHasItem > 955, 5000)
{
sM(“worked?”);
}
else if(playerHasItem < 955, 50000)
{
sM(“You need more cash”)
}

Read full topic
